## Upstream / Fork Notes

- [ ] Change is specific to this PeopleAPI fork (no upstream impact)
- [ ] Upstream parity checked or any divergence documented (if applicable)

## Licensing

- [ ] License references preserved or updated if upstream assets are touched

## Checklist

### Isaac Sim Extension
- [ ] Extension loads without errors in Isaac Sim
- [ ] New menu items or UI verified (if applicable)

### Assets (USD)
- [ ] Asset paths validated (no missing references/textures)
- [ ] Transforms/scale reviewed in scene (no unexpected offsets)
- [ ] Bounds/extents look correct (if geometry changed)

### Documentation
- [ ] Updated relevant docs or README (if behavior changed)
- [ ] Added screenshots/GIFs for UI or asset changes (if applicable)
